lv.definition: He, him; she, her; they, them (animate, singular).
(measure word) thin object, plant, tool, food (singular). cf {{branch}}

pk.definition: Branch @ (measure word) long, thin object, plant (singular).

lv.definition: (measure word) thin object, plant, tool, food (dual). cf {{branch}}

pk.definition: Branch @ (measure word) long, thin object, plant (dual).

lv.definition: (measure word) thin object, plant, tool, food (plural). cf {{branch}}

pk.definition: Branch @ (measure word) long, thin object, plant (plural).

lv.definition: (measure word) uncountable noun, e.g. substance, abstract noun
$age$ adds $pat$ onto $all$. @ (reflexive) $ins$ grows, increases. (frequentative) $age$ loads $pat$, cargo.
$pat$ is boiling. @ $age$ cooks, boils $pat$. @ $age$ bothers, startles $pat$.
Aunt, uncle. @ Any indirect relative of an older generation.
(reflexive) $pat$ and $pat$ are of the same clan.
$age$ builds $pat$, a building or ship. @ (inchoative) $age$ establishes, founds, begins construction on $pat$ @ $age$ nominates $gen$ for public office.

$age$ carries, holds $pat$ with difficulty. @ $age$/$loc$ contains, is pregnant with $pat$. @ $pat$ is heavy, serious, burdensome. @ $pat$ is difficult for $age$. @ (perfective) $age$ gives birth to $pat$. @ $age$ conceives $pat$.

pk.definition: Chaiya, a region in modern Thailand which hosted an important seaport during the Srivijaya empire. Some Kasanic people migrated there, eventually becoming the Botharu.

lv.definition: $age$ cuts, slices $pat$. @ (frequentative) $age$ chops up $pat$. @ $age$ operates on, castrates $pat$. @ (reflexive) $pat$ and $pat$ intersect.

pk.definition: Deep, long (of containers or holes with a single opening).

lv.definition: To depict, describe, draw. @ To plan.
To cover, to hang, to drape. Cloud; curtain; spider's web.

pk.definition: To cover, to hang, to drape.

lv.definition: To scratch. @ To plow. @ To write, draw (esp. line drawings).
$age$ drinks, swallows $pat$. @ $age$ inhales, smokes $pat$. @ (frequentative) $age$ slurps, sucks $pat$. @ (vulgar) $age$ performs oral sex on $pat$.
$age$ eats $pat$. @ (frequentative) $pat$ is a part of $age$'s diet.
$age$ fights. @ (reflexive) $age$ and $age$ fight against one another. @ (frequentative, literary) $age$ struggles against, slaughters $pat$.
Fish (teleost of typical body construction; not cartilaginous fish, eel, sunfish, catfish, or seahorse).

pk.definition: Tending to say upright, capable of carrying weight, buoyant on water.

lv.definition: (reflexive) $ins$ grows, ages. @ $pat$ expands in size. @ (reflexive) $ins$ ripens. @ $age$ cultivates, rears $ins$, an agricultural product. @ (frequentative) $ins$ multiplies, proliferates, is distributed.
$age$ (a person) blows, exhales on $all$. @ (frequentative) $age$ (a wind) blows, gusts.
Heel. @ With, together (used in positional constructions). @ (modal prefix) Together.
Eldest brother, heir. @ Boss, big-man, chief.

pk.definition: To crush, squeeze @ to hurry, rush

lv.definition: $age$ pierces, stings, stabs $pat$ with $ins$. @ $age$ inserts $ins$ into $all$. @ (vulgar) $age$ penetrates $pat$.

pk.definition: The interior of something with only one opening like a bag, a bodily orifice, or a hole in the ground.
Kendhang (two headed drum used to set tempo in a musical ensemble).
Kesang, a historical region around the modern Malaysian town of Tangkak. Considered the ancestral homeland of the Lauvìnko, it is the namesake of the Kasanic language family.

lv.definition: (reflexive) $age$ studies $gen$. @ (reflexive) $ins$ learns $gen$ through experience. @ $age$ teaches $ins$ about $gen$.
$age$ casts a fishing lure $pat$. @ $age$ lends $pat$ to $gen$.

pk.definition: To lie, to be (with adpositional phrase)

lv.definition: $age$ (plural) are married to one another (reflexive). @ $age$ is married to $gen$ (this case arrangement is mainly used attributively).
$ins$ (inanimate) is warm, mild. @ $pat$ (animate) feels warm, comfortable. @ $age$ (animate) is affectionate, friendly, relaxed.
$ins$ obscures, smudges, clouds $loc$. @ $age$/$ins$ prevents an occurrence $pat$.

pk.definition: Obscure, impede, block, prevent, smudge, cloud.

lv.definition: Part, component. @ (modal prefix) Partially, incompletely, somewhat.
$age$ opens, unlocks, $pat$. @ $age$ releases, turns loose $pat$. $age$ frees, surrenders $pat$.
$age$ searches for $gen$. @ $age$ wants $gen$. @ (perfective) $age$ finds $gen$. @ $age$ meets, meets up with $gen$. @ $age$ invents, creates $pat$. @ $age$ receives $pat$.

$age$ looks at, watches $gen$. @ (vulgar) $age$ has sex with, fucks $pat$. @ (inceptive) $age$ catches sight of $gen$. @ $age$ meets $gen$. @ (frequentative) $age$ understands, comprehends, empathizes with $gen$, a person or idea.
Father's son. @ Heir, beneficiary (of estate), successor.
$age$ speaks, says $pat$, a word (not a whole phrase). @ $age$ speaks about $gen$. @ $age$ speaks to, tells $all$. @ (frequentative) $age$ commands, is in charge.
$pat$ stands. @ $pat$, a formally animate noun, exists (used with adpositional statements).

sa.definition: Thread, wire; Aphorism, collection of aphorisms.

pk.definition: To teach, to give religious instruction.

lv.definition: Throat, interior of something with two openings.
$age$ touches, feels $pat$. @ $age$ affects, disturbs $pat$. @ (frequentative) $age$ strikes, hits $pat$.

pk.definition: To visit, to be a guest.

lv.definition: $age$ is wise. @ (inchoative, typically religious) $age$ instructs or presents a revelation to $ins$.
$pat$ is yellow. @ $pat$ is exuberant, spontaneous, fun. @ (inchoative) $pat$ cuts loose, gets high.
